headline: Closing Bell Movers: GameStop gains 7% on earnings, bitcoin announcement
summary: In the opening 90 minutes of the evening session, U.S. stock futures are up marginally – S&P500 is up 0.1% while Nasdaq 100 is up 0.2%. Earlier on Tuesday, Consumer Discretionary and Communications Services were the best performing sectors in the S&P500 – Google (GOOGL), Meta (META), and Netflix (NFLX) had over 1% gains among the mega-caps – while defensively-oriented Healthcare and Utilities underperformed.
